name: zaalouk
ingredients: 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar (or lemon juice)
steps: Rinse the eggplant, cut it into small cubes. Cook it for 10 minutes over low heat, covered, with olive oil in a pan/pot.
Score the skin of the tomatoes, immerse them for 20 seconds in boiling water to peel them. Cut them into small pieces and add them to the eggplant.
Peel and crush the garlic, add it to the pan along with the paprika and cumin. Add salt.
Mix while mashing the eggplant with a wooden spoon.
Cover and cook for 20 minutes over low heat, stirring occasionally and mashing the eggplant to turn it into a puree.
At the end of cooking, pour in the vinegar (or lemon juice), mix, and turn off the heat. Let cool before serving.
